name: Magical 17th Century French Castle
description:
DESCRIPTION
Our property is an authentic 17th Century French Castle, a magical place to celebrate the most beautiful day of your life in a magical setting. Our team is at your disposal to help you organize your special event and guide you in choosing your providers. As a family owned Chateaux we know the importance of making our property your home from home for your big day so we will be at your disposal to make everything perfect.
This Magical French Castle combines French-style luxury and refinement. To keep an unforgettable memory of this unique day, our establishment is the ideal place to organize your wedding. The Chateau has 25 hectares on the estate, conducive to strolling and exploring, enabling you to discover the château from different angles, arousing your curiosity in peaceful surroundings and also creating beautiful locations for your wedding day photography.
To ensure the success of your event, you will be able to rely on the exceptional know-how of our Chef and his brigade as well as on the high quality service of our restaurant.
You can either use our existing rooms to organize your celebration or we can help you to find a barnum to set up in our magnificent park which will allow you to use all the spaces as in your dreams... We have the capacity to hold 250 guests for a sit down event or 350 guests for a cocktail event. Our privatization rates start at 25 000€ per day.
The Magical French Castle embodies the French Art of Living. Its 20 rooms and suites are unique and authentically decorated. Overlooking the park, the French garden or the village, all our rooms and suites are decorated in a different colour with a unique atmosphere that you can choose according to your wishes. You will also find large suites located in the outbuildings and, for those located on the ground floor, you will enjoy private terraces which are very popular for an enjoyable breakfast or pre-dinner drinks. There is also a heated swimming pool on site for all your guests to use throughout their stay.
The Château team is at your disposal to ensure that your stay is extraordinary and unforgettable. More than 35 employees work passionately to create a high-quality experience while maintaining the beauty of the site and preserving the excellent condition of the Castle. We wish to share with you both our passion for our professions and our familial spirit – a spirit we all want to spotlight in our beloved Château. If this is somewhere that you think you would like to get married then please do get in touch for some more information.
